page.title: 08TIBBERTON CHILDRENS INTEREST
page.content: {EDUCATION}-We interviewed some nine year old children from Tibberton school.The children start school at 9 a.m. Their favourite lesson is Maths. because it is easy! They dislike English because there is too much writing. {COMPUTERS}-When the children were asked if they owned a home computer they answered 2 Commodore 64's, a Spectrum 16k, a Vic 20 and an Electron. {RECREATION}-Their main interests are riding bikes,fishing,watching television and sports.Their favourite pop groups are Bucks Fizz,Wham,Tears for Fears and Duran Duran.The childrens' favourite films are 'Streethawk',cartoons,'Cover Up' and Clint Eastwood films.
